folders_included_desc: Specify the folders to be handled by Zoottelkeeper. They must be absolute paths starting from the root vault, one per line, example: Notes/ <enter> Articles/, which will include Notes and Articles folder in the root folder. Empty list means all of the vault will be handled except the excluded folders. '*' can be added to the end, to include the folder's subdirectories recursively, e.g. Notes/* <enter> Articles/
folders_excluded_desc: Specify the folders NOT to be handled by Zoottelkeeper. They must be absolute paths starting from the root vault, one per line, an empty line excluding the root folder itself. Example:  "Notes/ <enter>  Articles/ ", it will exclude Notes and Articles folder in the root folder. * can be added to the end, to exclude the folder's subdirectories recursively.
trigger_indexing_desc: By pushing this button you can trigger the indexing on folders match your include/exclude criterias currently set.
clean_files_desc: This enables you to only show the files without path and '.md' ending in preview mode.
index_links_order_desc: Select the order of the links to be sorted in the index files.
list_style_desc: Select the style of the index-list.
embed_sub_index_content_in_preview_desc: If you enable this, the plugin will embed the sub-index content in preview mode.
index_prefix_desc: Per default the file is named after your folder, but you can prefix it here.
template_file_desc: Set your template file's absolute path like "templates/zoottel_template.md"
frontmatter_separator_desc: It specifies the separator string generated before and after the frontmatter, by default its ---
enable_meta_tags_desc: You can add Meta Tags at the top of your index-file. This is useful when you're using the index files as MOCs.
set_meta_tags_desc: You can add one or multiple tags to your index-files! There is no need to use "#", just use the exact value of the tags' separator specified below between the tags.
set_the_tag_s_label_in_frontmatter: Set the tag's label in frontmatter
set_the_tag_s_label_in_frontmatter_desc: Please specify the label of the tags in frontmatter (the text before the colon ):
set_the_tag_s_separator_in_frontmatter: Set the tag's separator in Frontmatter
set_the_tag_s_separator_in_frontmatter_d: Please specify the separator characters that distinguish the tags in Frontmatter:
add_square_brackets_around_each_tags: Add square brackets around each tags
add_square_brackets_around_each_tags_des: If you enable this, the plugin will put square brackets around the tags set.
enable_emojis_desc: You can set an emoji at the beginning of each index item depending on its type (file or folder). If multiple emojis matches, the first one will be stored.
